about_the_game:
Welcome!

It's 1996, and the popular game show Kill Ball is now in its third season. This high-stakes blood sport has gained more popularity than ever before! You can now enjoy all the fun of Killball in the comfort of your own home with your friends and family.

Players find themselves in an Arena resembling the game PONG,
Scoring the ball will grant the player one Explosive Bullet

Be careful, though, as players can only hold one bullet in their rifle at a time. Getting killed by the KillBall or Player results in you losing your bullet
so make your shots count

The first player to get three Kills Wins the game


Control the Pong paddles and player at the same time, use the controller triggers to move the Pong paddle up and down, and
the analog sticks to control the player in the arena


Use Steam Remote Play to play online with your friends.

This game only supports Local multiplayer.

Controllers Required

  • Move players freely across the arena play area.

  • top-down with 360 degrees of aiming

  • Keep track of the Win/loss count at the end of each game.

  • Experience a game that feels like rubbing your belly and patting your head simultaneously.

content_descriptors.notes:
Players Hit by the Ball will appear as a puddle of blood,
as the match continues, the playing field will become more obscured with blood.

name: Kill Ball

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel I3 or Equivalent
  • Graphics: GeForce 900 series or Higher
  • Additional Notes: Unity Game able to run on a wide range of computers

short_description: Battle against your friends and loved ones in Kill Ball! Score a goal and get an explosive bullet to kill your opponent. The first player to reach three kills wins the game and all the glory.
